lead_paragraph: A code violation for on-court coaching could not stop Svetlana Kuznetsova from producing a stirring comeback as she reached the Wimbledon fourth round for the first time in eight years with a 6-7(1) 6-2 8-6 win over American Sloane Stephens on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Kuznetsova Overcomes Coaching Controversy to Set Up Serena Showdown
headline.main: Kuznetsova Overcomes Coaching Controversy to Set Up Serena Showdown
